sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {useTranslation} from 'react-i18next' import {TimeCardWrapper} from '../atoms' import {Col, Row} from 'antd' import {Text} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Text' import moment from 'moment' export const TimeCard = ({recordDate}) => { const {t} = useTranslation() return ( {t('time')} {moment(recordDate).format('HH:MM')} {t('date')} {moment(recordDate).format('DD.MM.YYYY')} ) }
